Partner with our expert business consultants to gain unrestricted access to the region’s state-of-the-art startup facilities, diverse talent pool, and exciting networking opportunities.

items.title: DWTC - Dubai World Trade Center Free Zone

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Is TECOM an independent Free Zone?
items.answer: TECOM Free Zone includes 10 Free Zones across the UAE, focused on 6 industry sectors, including technology, electronic and media.

items.question: What is the timeline for TECOM FZ licensing?
items.answer: Generally, it takes 1-14 business days to secure your TECOM trade license, depending on your selected business activity, industry sector, and documentation readiness.

items.question: Do I need a local sponsor to set up in TECOM?
items.answer: No, TECOM Free Zone offers business owners 100% foreign ownership, eliminating the hassle of searching for and partnering with a local sponsor or agent.

items.question: Is it necessary to lease a physical office in TECOM FZ?
items.answer: No, TECOM Free Zone offers alternative options, including flexi-desk, co-working, and virtual office solutions, empowering you to save thousands on business setup.

items.question: What documents do I need to set up in TECOM Free Zone?
items.answer: Generally, you'll need a visa and passport copies, shareholder or manager's details, and a list of DED-compliant trade names, depending on your selected business license, legal structure, and business activity.
